name: Roman Chair Hyperextension
how_to_perform:
1. Adjust the Roman chair so that when you lie face down, your hips rest comfortably on the pad with enough room to hinge at the waist.
2. Secure your feet under the footpads, ensuring they are firmly held in place.
3. Keep your legs straight and your body aligned from head to heels.
4. Cross your arms over your chest or place your hands behind your head.
5. Begin the movement by lowering your upper body towards the floor, keeping your back straight. Hinge at the hips until you feel a comfortable stretch in your lower back.
6. Engage your core and reverse the motion, raising your upper body back to the starting position. Keep your head in line with your spine and avoid arching your back excessively.
7. Repeat the exercise for your desired number of repetitions, maintaining proper form throughout.
short_summary: The Roman chair hyperextension is an exercise that targets the lower back muscles using the Roman chair equipment.
